title: Damascus
brief_description: Part of the Vagabond Adventure series, shows scenes of Damascus including buildings, ruins, bazaars, streetscapes, artisans at work on intricate mother-of-pearl inlays, brass ornaments and the market places. Narrated by Alois Hovrilla.
